Profile

Front end developer and team leader with more than 15 years of experience in the development of high traffic websites and web apps, responsive and compliant with the latest standards (html5 and css3, javascript ES6), with extensive knowledge in cross browser development, optimization performance and online advertising, usability and accessibility principles, SEO and UX design practices. Knowledge of the main javascript frameworks and libraries, Rest API and client / server communication, versioning and build tool, agile development, unit and integration testing, worflow CI / CD.

Professional profile

Current position

Head of front end at Vivaticket S.p.a.

  • - In charge of the front end development of the new international B2C portal vivaticket.com and and the management of the front end development team
  • - Integration with existing ticketing engine systems and coordination with international development teams
  • - Analysis and development of the web based tool for editorial management and commercial planning of the portal contents.

May 2014 - August 2018

Senior front end developer at Editoriale Il Fatto Spa:

  • - implementation, development, optimization, testing and maintenance of the website www.ilfattoquotidiano.it (1.6 million of page views per day), special editorial projects and e-commerce portal.
  • - client-side integration and implementation of ADV networks and delivery systems (Google DFP, Outbrain, Criteo etc.), social sharing and in general third-party scripts and Apis.

January 2009 - May 2014

Senior front end developer at Zodiak Active Srl in Milan.

January 2004 - December 2008

Collaboration with Fullsix SpA in Milan as Multimedia Specialist and Front End Developer.
Freelancer activity.

September 2001 - January 2004

Web designer at Alchera Interactive SpA in Milan.

July - August 2001

Collaboration with the Municipality of Lodi as a web developer and website creation as a freelance.

April - August 2000

Training stage at Obweb srl in Milan as web designer and junior account.

January 1998 - December 1999

Collaboration at the library of the IULM university of Milan as assistant to the purchasing office and cataloging.

Education

March 2002

Six-month postgraduate course in Web Project Management at Genesio - Institute for New Technologies, Milan.

March 2000

Degree in Public Relations from IULM University in Milan with a thesis in Information Economics entitled "The record market and new technologies: piracy and private copying".

Supervisor prof. Carlo Antonio Ricciardi.
Degree mark: 110/110 with honors.

June 1995

Scientific high school degree obtained at the "Giovanni Gandini" state high school in Lodi.
Graduation mark: 56/60.
